section.p: The zoom widget is a combination of combo box and zoom in/out buttons located on the bottom left side of beermat. Using the combo box, you may select one of the sizes specified ranging from 5% to 3000%, or you may input a custom size. The +/- buttons are included for quick and easy zooming, these will zoom by a 50% factor each click. By clicking the word zoom, the image will return to its default size.
